name: C. Little Elephant and Problem
statement:
The Little Elephant has got a problem somebody has been touching his
sorted by non-decreasing array of length and possibly swapped some
elements of the array.The Little Elephant doesn’t want to call the
police until he understands if he could have accidentally changed the
array himself. He thinks that he could have accidentally changed array ,
only if array can be sorted in no more than one operation of swapping
elements (not necessarily adjacent). That is, the Little Elephant could
have accidentally swapped some two elements.Help the Little Elephant,
determine if he could have accidentally changed the array , sorted by
non-decreasing, himself.
